title: Okay I guess

The daily spin is rigged and very rarely will you get higher than 200, you may get lucky and get 500 or when you do get variety, you get something like a scratch off that turns to better luck next time. This game would be great if it wasn‚Äôt for how stupid it actually is most of the time.

title: Weeee!!!
text:
Don't let the name fool you, 8 ball is much more than a game of pool. It is more like a reflex testing gobstopper where 8 ball is at the center. A game of pool is in the center of multiple layers of click bate purchasing opportunities that flash under your unsuspecting finger! It's fun‚Ä¶ 

Honestly though, I play it a lot despite the annoying ‚Äúbate and switch‚Äù interface, it is addictive.

title: Great game but‚Ä¶
text: The gameplay and and game interface is excellent. You can tell they put some time money and effort in to this game. You can also tell that they‚Äôre trying to squeeze every dollar they can out of this ‚Äúfree‚Äù game. The in-game purchases are marketed super aggressively from the start. In between games windows constantly pop up trying to sell you on something. In fact, they pop up so quickly and without notice that you will unintentionally click on them and be transported to a payment confirmation screen before you know it. Good luck not getting charged. If you have kids you better unlink any cards, fast!
